scripts.postbuild: copyfiles schematics/**/schema.json schematics/*/files/** schematics/*/files-optional/** schematics/collection.json ../../dist/ngx-cli-library/ && copyfiles -u 2 ../../.vscode/**/* ../../dist/ngx-cli-library/schematics/ide-setup/files && copyfiles -u 2 ../../.prettierrc ../../dist/ngx-cli-library/schematics/ide-setup/files
scripts.publish-pre: npm run clean && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && ng build ngx-cli-library && npm run build && cd ../../dist/ngx-cli-library && npm pack && npm publish
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && ng build ngx-cli-library && npm run build && cd ../../dist/ngx-cli-library && npm pack && npm publish
scripts.compile: npm run clean && ng build ngx-cli-library && npm run build && cd ../ngx-cli-library-test && npm link ../../dist/ngx-cli-library
scripts.compile-test: npm run clean && ng build ngx-cli-library && npm run build && cd ../../dist/ngx-cli-library && npm pack
